name: 文艺绿色主题
description: 清新雅致的绿色主题，诗意盎然，适合文学艺术类内容
author: FlowEdit Team

inlineStyles.em: font-style: italic; color: rgb(34, 154, 96); font-weight: 500; letter-spacing: 1px; position: relative;
inlineStyles.i: font-style: italic; color: rgb(34, 154, 96); font-weight: 500; letter-spacing: 1px; position: relative;
inlineStyles.u: text-decoration: underline; text-decoration-color: rgb(52, 211, 153); text-underline-offset: 5px; text-decoration-thickness: 2px; text-decoration-style: wavy;
inlineStyles.code: font-family: '方正等线', 'SF Mono', 'Consolas', monospace; font-size: 0.9em; background: rgba(52, 211, 153, 0.08); color: rgb(6, 95, 70); padding: 0.3em 0.7em; border-radius: 8px; border: 1px dashed rgba(52, 211, 153, 0.3); font-weight: 500; letter-spacing: 0.8px;
inlineStyles.mark: background: rgba(167, 243, 208, 0.6); padding: 0.2em 0.6em; border-radius: 6px; color: rgb(6, 95, 70); box-shadow: 0 2px 4px rgba(52, 211, 153, 0.15); letter-spacing: 0.5px;
inlineStyles.a: color: rgb(34, 154, 96); text-decoration: underline; text-decoration-color: rgba(52, 211, 153, 0.6); text-underline-offset: 4px; transition: all 0.2s ease; letter-spacing: 0.4px;
inlineStyles.sup: color: rgb(52, 211, 153); font-size: 0.68em; margin-left: 0.3em; font-style: italic; font-weight: 500;

globalStyles.container: <section style='box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px; padding: 36px 32px; font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.9; color: rgb(6, 95, 70); font-family: "仿宋", "华文仿宋", "Times New Roman", "Noto Serif CJK SC", serif; letter-spacing: 1.5px; background: radial-gradient(ellipse at top, rgba(167, 243, 208, 0.12) 0%, rgba(240, 253, 244, 0.9) 70%); border: 2px solid rgba(52, 211, 153, 0.15); border-radius: 20px; position: relative; word-break: break-word;'>{{content}}</section>

blocks.delimiter: <section style='display: flex; justify-content: center; align-items: center; margin: 3.5em 0; position: relative;'><hr style='flex: 1; height: 1.5px; background: linear-gradient(90deg, transparent 0%, rgba(52, 211, 153, 0.2) 20%, rgba(52, 211, 153, 0.7) 50%, rgba(52, 211, 153, 0.2) 80%, transparent 100%); border: none; border-radius: 1px;' /></section>

optional.caption: <figcaption style='margin-top: 18px; font-size: 14px; color: rgb(34, 154, 96); font-style: italic; line-height: 1.7; text-align: center; font-family: "方正楷体", "KaiTi", serif; letter-spacing: 0.8px;'>{{value}}</figcaption>
